;;;716      void Dis_Char(unsigned char y,unsigned char x,unsigned char asc) 
000000  b5f8              PUSH     {r3-r7,lr}
;;;717    {
000002  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000004  460c              MOV      r4,r1
000006  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;718      unsigned char ch2[2];
;;;719    	x=x*8;        
000008  06e0              LSLS     r0,r4,#27
00000a  0e04              LSRS     r4,r0,#24
;;;720    	ch2[0] = asc;	
00000c  f88d6000          STRB     r6,[sp,#0]
;;;721    	ch2[1] = '\0';			//字母占一个字节
000010  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000012  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;722    	OLED_P6x8Str(x , y , ch2);	//显示字母
000016  466a              MOV      r2,sp
000018  4629              MOV      r1,r5
00001a  4620              MOV      r0,r4

;;;723    }
000020  bdf8              POP      {r3-r7,pc}
;;;724      void Dis_String(unsigned char y, unsigned char x, unsigned char ch[])
                          ENDP

                  Dis_Num PROC
;;;750    
;;;751    void Dis_Num(unsigned char y, unsigned char x, unsigned int num,unsigned char N) 
000000  e92d41fc          PUSH     {r2-r8,lr}
;;;752    {
000004  4607              MOV      r7,r0
000006  460e              MOV      r6,r1

00000a  4698              MOV      r8,r3
;;;753      unsigned char j=0;
00000c  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
;;;754      unsigned char n[6]={0};
00000e  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000010  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
000012  9001              STR      r0,[sp,#4]
;;;755      x=x*8;
000014  06f0              LSLS     r0,r6,#27
000016  0e06              LSRS     r6,r0,#24
;;;756      n[0]=(num/10000)%10; 
000018  f2427010          MOV      r0,#0x2710
00001c  fbb4f0f0          UDIV     r0,r4,r0
000020  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
000022  fbb0f2f1          UDIV     r2,r0,r1
000026  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
00002a  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;757      n[1]=(num/1000)%10;
00002e  f44f707a          MOV      r0,#0x3e8
000032  fbb4f0f0          UDIV     r0,r4,r0
000036  fbb0f2f1          UDIV     r2,r0,r1
00003a  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
00003e  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;758      n[2]=(num/100)%10;
000042  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
000044  fbb4f0f0          UDIV     r0,r4,r0
000048  fbb0f2f1          UDIV     r2,r0,r1
00004c  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
000050  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;759      n[3]=(num/10)%10;
000054  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000056  fbb4f0f0          UDIV     r0,r4,r0
00005a  fbb0f2f1          UDIV     r2,r0,r1
00005e  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
000062  f88d0003          STRB     r0,[sp,#3]
;;;760      n[4]=num%10;
000066  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000068  fbb4f1f0          UDIV     r1,r4,r0
00006c  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
000070  f88d0004          STRB     r0,[sp,#4]
;;;761    //  n[6]='\0';			   
;;;762      for(j=0;j<5;j++) n[j]=n[j]+16+32;
000074  bf00              NOP      
000076  e007              B        |L4.136|
                  |L4.120|
000078  f81d0005          LDRB     r0,[sp,r5]
00007c  3030              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x30
00007e  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
000080  f80d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,r5]
000084  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1
000086  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
                  |L4.136|
000088  2d05              CMP      r5,#5
00008a  dbf5              BLT      |L4.120|
;;;763      OLED_P8x16Str(x,y,&n[5-N]);//从ACSII码表中读取字节，然后写入液晶
00008c  f1c80005          RSB      r0,r8,#5
000090  4669              MOV      r1,sp
000092  1842              ADDS     r2,r0,r1
000094  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000096  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000098  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_P8x16Str
;;;764    }
00009c  e8bd81fc          POP      {r2-r8,pc}
;;;765    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Dis_String||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Dis_String PROC
;;;723    }
;;;724      void Dis_String(unsigned char y, unsigned char x, unsigned char ch[])
000000  b5f8              PUSH     {r3-r7,lr}
;;;725    {
000002  4607              MOV      r7,r0
000004  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000006  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;726    	unsigned char ch2[3];
;;;727    	unsigned char ii=0;
000008  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;728    	x=x*8;        
00000a  06f0              LSLS     r0,r6,#27
00000c  0e06              LSRS     r6,r0,#24
;;;729    	while(ch[ii] != '\0')
00000e  e027              B        |L5.96|
                  |L5.16|
;;;730    	{
;;;731    		if(ch[ii] > 127)
000010  5d28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r4]
000012  287f              CMP      r0,#0x7f
000014  dd14              BLE      |L5.64|
;;;732    		{
;;;733    			ch2[0] = ch[ii];
000016  5d28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r4]
000018  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;734    	 		ch2[1] = ch[ii + 1];
00001c  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001e  5c28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r0]
000020  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;735    			ch2[2] = '\0';			//汉字为两个字节
000024  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000026  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;736    			OLED_P14x16Str(x , y, ch2);	//显示汉字
00002a  466a              MOV      r2,sp
00002c  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00002e  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000030  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_P14x16Str
;;;737    			x += 14;
000034  f106000e          ADD      r0,r6,#0xe
000038  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;738    			ii += 2;
00003a  1ca0              ADDS     r0,r4,#2
00003c  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
00003e  e00f              B        |L5.96|
                  |L5.64|
;;;739    		}
;;;740    		else
;;;741    		{
;;;742    			ch2[0] = ch[ii];	
000040  5d28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r4]
000042  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;743    			ch2[1] = '\0';			//字母占一个字节
000046  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000048  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;744    			OLED_P8x16Str(x , y , ch2);	//显示字母
00004c  466a              MOV      r2,sp
00004e  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000050  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000052  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_P8x16Str
;;;745    			x += 8;
000056  f1060008          ADD      r0,r6,#8
00005a  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;746    			ii+= 1;
00005c  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00005e  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
                  |L5.96|
000060  5d28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r4]            ;729
000062  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;729
000064  d1d4              BNE      |L5.16|
;;;747    		}
;;;748    	}
;;;749    }
000066  bdf8              POP      {r3-r7,pc}
;;;750    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_3num||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_3num PROC
;;;872    
;;;873      void OLED_3num(unsigned char x,unsigned char y,unsigned char number)
000000  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
;;;874    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000008  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;875            unsigned char ge,shi,bai;
;;;876            ge = number % 10;
00000a  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
00000c  fb94f1f0          SDIV     r1,r4,r0
000010  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
000014  b2c7              UXTB     r7,r0
;;;877            shi = number / 10 %10;
000016  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000018  fb94f0f0          SDIV     r0,r4,r0
00001c  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
00001e  fb90f2f1          SDIV     r2,r0,r1
000022  fb010012          MLS      r0,r1,r2,r0
000026  f00008ff          AND      r8,r0,#0xff
;;;878            bai = number / 100;
00002a  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
00002c  fb94f0f0          SDIV     r0,r4,r0
000030  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff
;;;879            OLED_Num(x+2,y,ge);
000034  1ca9              ADDS     r1,r5,#2
000036  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000038  463a              MOV      r2,r7
00003a  4631              MOV      r1,r6
00003c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;880            OLED_Num(x+1,y,shi);
000040  1c69              ADDS     r1,r5,#1
000042  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000044  4642              MOV      r2,r8
000046  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000048  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;881            OLED_Num(x,y,bai);
00004c  464a              MOV      r2,r9
00004e  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000050  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000052  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;882    
;;;883    }
000056  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
;;;884      void OLED_4num(unsigned char x,unsigned char y, int number)
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_4num||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_4num PROC
;;;883    }
;;;884      void OLED_4num(unsigned char x,unsigned char y, int number)
000000  e92d5ff0          PUSH     {r4-r12,lr}
;;;885    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  468b              MOV      r11,r1
000008  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;886            unsigned char qian,bai,shi,ge;
;;;887    	      int num =number;
00000a  4634              MOV      r4,r6
;;;888    	if(num<0)
00000c  2c00              CMP      r4,#0
00000e  da00              BGE      |L7.18|
;;;889    	{
;;;890         num=-num;
000010  4264              RSBS     r4,r4,#0
                  |L7.18|
;;;891      }
;;;892            qian=num/1000;
000012  f44f707a          MOV      r0,#0x3e8
000016  fb94f0f0          SDIV     r0,r4,r0
00001a  b2c7              UXTB     r7,r0
;;;893            bai=num%1000/100;
00001c  f44f707a          MOV      r0,#0x3e8
000020  fb94f1f0          SDIV     r1,r4,r0
000024  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
000028  2164              MOVS     r1,#0x64
00002a  fb90f0f1          SDIV     r0,r0,r1
00002e  f00008ff          AND      r8,r0,#0xff
;;;894            shi=num%100/10;
000032  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
000034  fb94f1f0          SDIV     r1,r4,r0
000038  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
00003c  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
00003e  fb90f0f1          SDIV     r0,r0,r1
000042  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff
;;;895            ge=num%10;
000046  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000048  fb94f1f0          SDIV     r1,r4,r0
00004c  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
000050  f0000aff          AND      r10,r0,#0xff
;;;896    
;;;897            OLED_Num(x,y,qian);
000054  463a              MOV      r2,r7
000056  4659              MOV      r1,r11
000058  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00005a  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;898            OLED_Num(x+1,y,bai);
00005e  1c69              ADDS     r1,r5,#1
000060  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000062  4642              MOV      r2,r8
000064  4659              MOV      r1,r11
000066  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;899            OLED_Num(x+2,y,shi);
00006a  1ca9              ADDS     r1,r5,#2
00006c  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
00006e  464a              MOV      r2,r9
000070  4659              MOV      r1,r11
000072  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;900            OLED_Num(x+3,y,ge);
000076  1ce9              ADDS     r1,r5,#3
000078  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
00007a  4652              MOV      r2,r10
00007c  4659              MOV      r1,r11
00007e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;901    }
000082  e8bd9ff0          POP      {r4-r12,pc}
;;;902    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_CLS||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_CLS PROC
;;;422    }
;;;423    void OLED_CLS(void)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;424    {
;;;425    	unsigned char y,x;	
;;;426    	for(y=0;y<8;y++)
000002  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
000004  e015              B        |L8.50|
                  |L8.6|
;;;427    	{
;;;428    		OLED_WrCmd(0xb0+y);
000006  f10401b0          ADD      r1,r4,#0xb0
00000a  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;429    		OLED_WrCmd(0x01);
000010  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000012  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;430    		OLED_WrCmd(0x10); 
000016  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000018  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;431    		for(x=0;x<X_WIDTH;x++)
00001c  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
00001e  e004              B        |L8.42|
                  |L8.32|
;;;432    		OLED_WrDat(0);
000020  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000022  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
000026  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;431
000028  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;431
                  |L8.42|
00002a  2d80              CMP      r5,#0x80              ;431
00002c  dbf8              BLT      |L8.32|
00002e  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;426
000030  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0                 ;426
                  |L8.50|
000032  2c08              CMP      r4,#8                 ;426
000034  dbe7              BLT      |L8.6|
;;;433    	}
;;;434    }
000036  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;435    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_DLY_ms||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_DLY_ms PROC
;;;292    
;;;293    void OLED_DLY_ms(unsigned int ms)
000000  e007              B        |L9.18|
                  |L9.2|
;;;294    {                         
;;;295      unsigned int a;
;;;296      while(ms)
;;;297      {
;;;298        a=1335;
000002  f2405137          MOV      r1,#0x537
;;;299        while(a--);
000006  bf00              NOP      
                  |L9.8|
000008  1e0a              SUBS     r2,r1,#0
00000a  f1a10101          SUB      r1,r1,#1
00000e  d1fb              BNE      |L9.8|
;;;300        ms--;
000010  1e40              SUBS     r0,r0,#1
                  |L9.18|
000012  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;296
000014  d1f5              BNE      |L9.2|
;;;301      }
;;;302      return;
;;;303    }
000016  4770              BX       lr
;;;304    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_Fill||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_Fill PROC
;;;409    } 
;;;410    void OLED_Fill(unsigned char bmp_data) //写数据比如写0x00为清屏 0xff为满频
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;411    {
000002  4606              MOV      r6,r0
;;;412    	unsigned char y,x;
;;;413    	
;;;414    	for(y=0;y<8;y++)
000004  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
000006  e015              B        |L10.52|
                  |L10.8|
;;;415    	{
;;;416    		OLED_WrCmd(0xb0+y);
000008  f10401b0          ADD      r1,r4,#0xb0
00000c  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;417    		OLED_WrCmd(0x01);
000012  2001              MOVS     r0,#1
000014  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;418    		OLED_WrCmd(0x10);
000018  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
00001a  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;419    		for(x=0;x<X_WIDTH;x++)
00001e  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
000020  e004              B        |L10.44|
                  |L10.34|
;;;420    		OLED_WrDat(bmp_data);
000022  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000024  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
000028  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;419
00002a  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;419
                  |L10.44|
00002c  2d80              CMP      r5,#0x80              ;419
00002e  dbf8              BLT      |L10.34|
000030  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;414
000032  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0                 ;414
                  |L10.52|
000034  2c08              CMP      r4,#8                 ;414
000036  dbe7              BLT      |L10.8|
;;;421    	}
;;;422    }
000038  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;423    void OLED_CLS(void)
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_Init||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  OLED_Init PROC
;;;304    
;;;305    void OLED_Init(void)        
000000  b508              PUSH     {r3,lr}
;;;306    {
;;;307        GPIO_InitTypeDef OLED_GPIO_InitStructure;
;;;308    
;;;309    	RCC_APB2PeriphClockCmd(OLED_RCCEN, ENABLE); 	 //GPIO濮缁浣胯
000002  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000004  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000006  f7fffffe          BL       RCC_APB2PeriphClockCmd
;;;310    
;;;311        OLED_GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Pin = OLED_SCL|OLED_SDA|OLED_RST|OLED_DC;
00000a  200f              MOVS     r0,#0xf
00000c  f8ad0000          STRH     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;312    	OLED_GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Speed = GPIO_Speed_50MHz;
000010  2003              MOVS     r0,#3
000012  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;313    	OLED_GPIO_InitStructure.GPIO_Mode = GPIO_Mode_Out_PP;
000016  2010              MOVS     r0,#0x10
000018  f88d0003          STRB     r0,[sp,#3]
;;;314    	GPIO_Init(OLED_GPIO, &OLED_GPIO_InitStructure); 		           //缃OLED绔ｅ涓GPIO杈
00001c  4669              MOV      r1,sp
00001e  483d              LDR      r0,|L11.276|
000020  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_Init
;;;315    
;;;316    	OLED_SCLK_Set();  	
000024  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000026  483b              LDR      r0,|L11.276|
000028  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
;;;317    	
;;;318    	OLED_RST_Clr();
00002c  2102              MOVS     r1,#2
00002e  4839              LDR      r0,|L11.276|
000030  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
;;;319        OLED_DLY_ms(50);
000034  2032              MOVS     r0,#0x32
000036  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_DLY_ms
;;;320        OLED_RST_Set();
00003a  2102              MOVS     r1,#2
00003c  4835              LDR      r0,|L11.276|
00003e  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
;;;321    	
;;;322        OLED_WR_Byte(0xAE,OLED_CMD); //关闭显示
000042  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000044  20ae              MOVS     r0,#0xae
000046  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;323    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xD5,OLED_CMD); //设置时钟分频因子,震荡频率
00004a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00004c  20d5              MOVS     r0,#0xd5
00004e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;324    	OLED_WR_Byte(0X80,OLED_CMD); //[3:0],分频因子;[7:4],震荡频率
000052  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000054  2080              MOVS     r0,#0x80
000056  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;325    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xA8,OLED_CMD); //设置驱动路数
00005a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00005c  20a8              MOVS     r0,#0xa8
00005e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;326    	OLED_WR_Byte(0X3F,OLED_CMD); //默认0X3F(1/64) 
000062  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000064  203f              MOVS     r0,#0x3f
000066  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;327    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xD3,OLED_CMD); //设置显示偏移
00006a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00006c  20d3              MOVS     r0,#0xd3
00006e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;328    	OLED_WR_Byte(0X00,OLED_CMD); //默认为0
000072  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000074  4608              MOV      r0,r1
000076  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;329    
;;;330    	OLED_WR_Byte(0x40|0X00,OLED_CMD); //设置显示开始行 [5:0],行数.
00007a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00007c  2040              MOVS     r0,#0x40
00007e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;331    													    
;;;332    	OLED_WR_Byte(0x8D,OLED_CMD); //电荷泵设置
000082  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000084  208d              MOVS     r0,#0x8d
000086  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;333    	OLED_WR_Byte(0x14,OLED_CMD); //bit2，开启/关闭
00008a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00008c  2014              MOVS     r0,#0x14
00008e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;334    	OLED_WR_Byte(0x20,OLED_CMD); //设置内存地址模式
000092  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000094  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
000096  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;335    	OLED_WR_Byte(0x02,OLED_CMD); //[1:0],00，列地址模式;01，行地址模式;10,页地址模式;默认10;
00009a  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
00009c  2002              MOVS     r0,#2
00009e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;336    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xA1,OLED_CMD); //段重定义设置,bit0:0,0->0;1,0->127;
0000a2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000a4  20a1              MOVS     r0,#0xa1
0000a6  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;337    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xC8,OLED_CMD); //设置COM扫描方向;bit3:0,普通模式;1,重定义模式 COM[N-1]->COM0;N:驱动路数
0000aa  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000ac  20c8              MOVS     r0,#0xc8
0000ae  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;338    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xDA,OLED_CMD); //设置COM硬件引脚配置
0000b2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000b4  20da              MOVS     r0,#0xda
0000b6  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;339    	OLED_WR_Byte(0x12,OLED_CMD); //[5:4]配置
0000ba  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000bc  2012              MOVS     r0,#0x12
0000be  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;340    		 
;;;341    	OLED_WR_Byte(0x81,OLED_CMD); //对比度设置
0000c2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000c4  2081              MOVS     r0,#0x81
0000c6  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;342    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xEF,OLED_CMD); //1~255;默认0X7F (亮度设置,越大越亮)
0000ca  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000cc  20ef              MOVS     r0,#0xef
0000ce  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;343    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xD9,OLED_CMD); //设置预充电周期
0000d2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000d4  20d9              MOVS     r0,#0xd9
0000d6  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;344    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xf1,OLED_CMD); //[3:0],PHASE 1;[7:4],PHASE 2;
0000da  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000dc  20f1              MOVS     r0,#0xf1
0000de  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;345    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xDB,OLED_CMD); //设置VCOMH 电压倍率
0000e2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000e4  20db              MOVS     r0,#0xdb
0000e6  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;346    	OLED_WR_Byte(0x40,OLED_CMD); //[6:4] 000,0.65*vcc;001,0.77*vcc;011,0.83*vcc;
0000ea  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000ec  2040              MOVS     r0,#0x40
0000ee  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;347    
;;;348    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xA4,OLED_CMD); //全局显示开启;bit0:1,开启;0,关闭;(白屏/黑屏)
0000f2  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000f4  20a4              MOVS     r0,#0xa4
0000f6  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;349    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xA6,OLED_CMD); //设置显示方式;bit0:1,反相显示;0,正常显示	    						   
0000fa  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
0000fc  20a6              MOVS     r0,#0xa6
0000fe  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;350    	OLED_WR_Byte(0xAF,OLED_CMD); //开启显示	 
000102  2100              MOVS     r1,#0
000104  20af              MOVS     r0,#0xaf
000106  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WR_Byte
;;;351    
;;;352      OLED_Fill(0x00);  //初始清屏
00010a  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00010c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Fill
;;;353    	
;;;354    } 
000110  bd08              POP      {r3,pc}
;;;355    
                          ENDP

000112  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L11.276|
                          DCD      0x40011000

                          AREA ||i.OLED_Num||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  OLED_Num PROC
;;;902    
;;;903      void OLED_Num(unsigned char x,unsigned char y,unsigned char asc) 
000000  e92d41f0          PUSH     {r4-r8,lr}
;;;904    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000008  4616              MOV      r6,r2
;;;905        int i=0;
00000a  bf00              NOP      
;;;906        OLED_Set_Pos(x*6,y);
00000c  eb050145          ADD      r1,r5,r5,LSL #1
000010  0649              LSLS     r1,r1,#25
000012  0e08              LSRS     r0,r1,#24
000014  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000016  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;907        for(i=0;i<6;i++)
00001a  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00001c  e00a              B        |L12.52|
                  |L12.30|
;;;908        {
;;;909           OLED_WrDat(F6x8[asc+16][i]);         
00001e  f1060110          ADD      r1,r6,#0x10
000022  eb010141          ADD      r1,r1,r1,LSL #1
000026  4a05              LDR      r2,|L12.60|
000028  eb020141          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #1
00002c  5d08              LDRB     r0,[r1,r4]
00002e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
000032  1c64              ADDS     r4,r4,#1              ;907
                  |L12.52|
000034  2c06              CMP      r4,#6                 ;907
000036  dbf2              BLT      |L12.30|
;;;910        }
;;;911    }
000038  e8bd81f0          POP      {r4-r8,pc}
;;;912    void OLED_Num5(unsigned char x,unsigned char y,unsigned int number)
                          ENDP

                  |L12.60|
                          DCD      F6x8

                          AREA ||i.OLED_Num5||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_Num5 PROC
;;;911    }
;;;912    void OLED_Num5(unsigned char x,unsigned char y,unsigned int number)
000000  e92d5ff0          PUSH     {r4-r12,lr}
;;;913    {
000004  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000006  460e              MOV      r6,r1
000008  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;914            unsigned char wan,qian,bai,shi,ge;
;;;915            wan=number/10000;
00000a  f2427010          MOV      r0,#0x2710
00000e  fbb4f0f0          UDIV     r0,r4,r0
000012  b2c7              UXTB     r7,r0
;;;916    		qian = number%10000/1000;
000014  f2427010          MOV      r0,#0x2710
000018  fbb4f1f0          UDIV     r1,r4,r0
00001c  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
000020  f44f717a          MOV      r1,#0x3e8
000024  fbb0f0f1          UDIV     r0,r0,r1
000028  f00008ff          AND      r8,r0,#0xff
;;;917            bai=number%1000/100;
00002c  4608              MOV      r0,r1
00002e  fbb4f1f0          UDIV     r1,r4,r0
000032  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
000036  2164              MOVS     r1,#0x64
000038  fbb0f0f1          UDIV     r0,r0,r1
00003c  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff
;;;918            shi=number%100/10;
000040  2064              MOVS     r0,#0x64
000042  fbb4f1f0          UDIV     r1,r4,r0
000046  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
00004a  210a              MOVS     r1,#0xa
00004c  fbb0faf1          UDIV     r10,r0,r1
;;;919            ge=number%10;
000050  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000052  fbb4f1f0          UDIV     r1,r4,r0
000056  fb004b11          MLS      r11,r0,r1,r4
;;;920    
;;;921            OLED_Num(x,y,wan);
00005a  463a              MOV      r2,r7
00005c  4631              MOV      r1,r6
00005e  4628              MOV      r0,r5
000060  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;922            OLED_Num(x+1,y,qian);
000064  1c69              ADDS     r1,r5,#1
000066  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000068  4642              MOV      r2,r8
00006a  4631              MOV      r1,r6
00006c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;923            OLED_Num(x+2,y,bai);
000070  1ca9              ADDS     r1,r5,#2
000072  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000074  464a              MOV      r2,r9
000076  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000078  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;924            OLED_Num(x+3,y,shi);
00007c  1ce9              ADDS     r1,r5,#3
00007e  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000080  4652              MOV      r2,r10
000082  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000084  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;925    		OLED_Num(x+4,y,ge);
000088  1d29              ADDS     r1,r5,#4
00008a  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
00008c  465a              MOV      r2,r11
00008e  4631              MOV      r1,r6
000090  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Num
;;;926    }
000094  e8bd9ff0          POP      {r4-r12,pc}
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_P14x16Str||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  OLED_P14x16Str PROC
;;;632    //输出汉字字符串
;;;633      void OLED_P14x16Str(unsigned char x,u8 y,unsigned char ch[])
000000  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
;;;634    {
000004  4681              MOV      r9,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000008  4690              MOV      r8,r2
;;;635    	unsigned char wm=0,ii = 0;
00000a  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00000c  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
;;;636    	unsigned int adder=1; 
00000e  2501              MOVS     r5,#1
;;;637    	
;;;638    	while(ch[ii] != '\0')
000010  e06b              B        |L14.234|
                  |L14.18|
;;;639    	{
;;;640      	wm = 0;
000012  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;641      	adder = 1;
000014  2501              MOVS     r5,#1
;;;642      	while(F14x16_Idx[wm] > 127)
000016  e013              B        |L14.64|
                  |L14.24|
;;;643      	{
;;;644      		if(F14x16_Idx[wm] == ch[ii])
000018  4837              LDR      r0,|L14.248|
00001a  5d00              LDRB     r0,[r0,r4]
00001c  f8181006          LDRB     r1,[r8,r6]
000020  4288              CMP      r0,r1
000022  d10b              BNE      |L14.60|
;;;645      		{
;;;646      			if(F14x16_Idx[wm + 1] == ch[ii + 1])
000024  4934              LDR      r1,|L14.248|
000026  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
000028  5c09              LDRB     r1,[r1,r0]
00002a  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1
00002c  f8180000          LDRB     r0,[r8,r0]
000030  4281              CMP      r1,r0
000032  d103              BNE      |L14.60|
;;;647      			{
;;;648      				adder = wm * 14;
000034  ebc400c4          RSB      r0,r4,r4,LSL #3
000038  0045              LSLS     r5,r0,#1
;;;649      				break;
00003a  e005              B        |L14.72|
                  |L14.60|
;;;650      			}
;;;651      		}
;;;652      		wm += 2;			
00003c  1ca0              ADDS     r0,r4,#2
00003e  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
                  |L14.64|
000040  482d              LDR      r0,|L14.248|
000042  5d00              LDRB     r0,[r0,r4]            ;642
000044  287f              CMP      r0,#0x7f              ;642
000046  dce7              BGT      |L14.24|
                  |L14.72|
000048  bf00              NOP                            ;649
;;;653      	}
;;;654      	if(x>118){x=0;y++;}
00004a  f1b90f76          CMP      r9,#0x76
00004e  dd03              BLE      |L14.88|
000050  f04f0900          MOV      r9,#0
000054  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1
000056  b2c7              UXTB     r7,r0
                  |L14.88|
;;;655      	OLED_Set_Pos(x , y); 
000058  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00005a  4648              MOV      r0,r9
00005c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;656      	if(adder != 1)// 显示汉字					
000060  2d01              CMP      r5,#1
000062  d01f              BEQ      |L14.164|
;;;657      	{
;;;658      		OLED_Set_Pos(x , y);
000064  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000066  4648              MOV      r0,r9
000068  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;659      		for(wm = 0;wm < 14;wm++)               
00006c  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00006e  e006              B        |L14.126|
                  |L14.112|
;;;660      		{
;;;661      			OLED_WrDat(F14x16[adder]);	
000070  4922              LDR      r1,|L14.252|
000072  5d48              LDRB     r0,[r1,r5]
000074  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
;;;662      			adder += 1;
000078  1c6d              ADDS     r5,r5,#1
00007a  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;659
00007c  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0                 ;659
                  |L14.126|
00007e  2c0e              CMP      r4,#0xe               ;659
000080  dbf6              BLT      |L14.112|
;;;663      		}      
;;;664      		OLED_Set_Pos(x,y + 1); 
000082  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1
000084  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
000086  4648              MOV      r0,r9
000088  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;665      		for(wm = 0;wm < 14;wm++)          
00008c  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00008e  e006              B        |L14.158|
                  |L14.144|
;;;666      		{
;;;667      			OLED_WrDat(F14x16[adder]);
000090  491a              LDR      r1,|L14.252|
000092  5d48              LDRB     r0,[r1,r5]
000094  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
;;;668      			adder += 1;
000098  1c6d              ADDS     r5,r5,#1
00009a  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;665
00009c  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0                 ;665
                  |L14.158|
00009e  2c0e              CMP      r4,#0xe               ;665
0000a0  dbf6              BLT      |L14.144|
0000a2  e01c              B        |L14.222|
                  |L14.164|
;;;669      		}   		
;;;670      	}
;;;671      	else			  //显示空白字符			
;;;672      	{
;;;673      		ii += 1;
0000a4  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1
0000a6  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;674          OLED_Set_Pos(x,y);
0000a8  4639              MOV      r1,r7
0000aa  4648              MOV      r0,r9
0000ac  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;675      		for(wm = 0;wm < 16;wm++)
0000b0  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
0000b2  e004              B        |L14.190|
                  |L14.180|
;;;676      		{
;;;677      				OLED_WrDat(0);
0000b4  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0000b6  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
0000ba  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;675
0000bc  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0                 ;675
                  |L14.190|
0000be  2c10              CMP      r4,#0x10              ;675
0000c0  dbf8              BLT      |L14.180|
;;;678      		}
;;;679      		OLED_Set_Pos(x,y + 1);
0000c2  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1
0000c4  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
0000c6  4648              MOV      r0,r9
0000c8  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;680      		for(wm = 0;wm < 16;wm++)
0000cc  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
0000ce  e004              B        |L14.218|
                  |L14.208|
;;;681      		{   		
;;;682      				OLED_WrDat(0);	
0000d0  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
0000d2  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
0000d6  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;680
0000d8  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0                 ;680
                  |L14.218|
0000da  2c10              CMP      r4,#0x10              ;680
0000dc  dbf8              BLT      |L14.208|
                  |L14.222|
;;;683      		}
;;;684      	}
;;;685      	x += 14;
0000de  f109000e          ADD      r0,r9,#0xe
0000e2  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff
;;;686      	ii += 2;
0000e6  1cb0              ADDS     r0,r6,#2
0000e8  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
                  |L14.234|
0000ea  f8180006          LDRB     r0,[r8,r6]            ;638
0000ee  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;638
0000f0  d18f              BNE      |L14.18|
;;;687    	}
;;;688    }
0000f2  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
;;;689    //输出汉字和字符混合字符串
                          ENDP

0000f6  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L14.248|
                          DCD      F14x16_Idx
                  |L14.252|
                          DCD      F14x16

                          AREA ||i.OLED_P6x8Num_8bit||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_P6x8Num_8bit PROC
;;;859    }
;;;860      void OLED_P6x8Num_8bit(unsigned char x,unsigned char y,unsigned char Number)
000000  b5f8              PUSH     {r3-r7,lr}
;;;861    {
000002  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000004  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000006  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;862    	unsigned char ch[3]={0};
000008  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00000a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
;;;863    	int n;
;;;864    	for(n=2;n>=0;n--)
00000c  2502              MOVS     r5,#2
00000e  e00d              B        |L15.44|
                  |L15.16|
;;;865    	{
;;;866    		ch[n]=Number%10+'0';
000010  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000012  fb94f1f0          SDIV     r1,r4,r0
000016  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
00001a  3030              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x30
00001c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001e  f80d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,r5]
;;;867    		Number=Number/10;
000022  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000024  fb94f0f0          SDIV     r0,r4,r0
000028  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
00002a  1e6d              SUBS     r5,r5,#1              ;864
                  |L15.44|
00002c  2d00              CMP      r5,#0                 ;864
00002e  daef              BGE      |L15.16|
;;;868    	}
;;;869    	OLED_P6x8Str(x,y,ch);
000030  466a              MOV      r2,sp
000032  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000034  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000036  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_P6x8Str
;;;870    
;;;871    }
00003a  bdf8              POP      {r3-r7,pc}
;;;872    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_P6x8Str||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  OLED_P6x8Str PROC
;;;593    //==============================================================  
;;;594      void OLED_P6x8Str(u8 x,u8 y,u8 ch[])//小字符串
000000  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
;;;595    {
000004  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000006  4688              MOV      r8,r1
000008  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;596      u8 c=0,i=0,j=0;
00000a  f04f0900          MOV      r9,#0
00000e  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
000010  2700              MOVS     r7,#0
;;;597      OLED_Set_Pos(x,y);      
000012  4641              MOV      r1,r8
000014  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000016  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;598      while (ch[j]!='\0')
00001a  e01c              B        |L16.86|
                  |L16.28|
;;;599      {    
;;;600        c =ch[j]-32;
00001c  5de8              LDRB     r0,[r5,r7]
00001e  3820              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x20
000020  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff
;;;601        if(x>126){x=0;y++;}    
000024  2c7e              CMP      r4,#0x7e
000026  dd04              BLE      |L16.50|
000028  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00002a  f1080001          ADD      r0,r8,#1
00002e  f00008ff          AND      r8,r0,#0xff
                  |L16.50|
;;;602      	for(i=0;i<6;i++)     
000032  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
000034  e009              B        |L16.74|
                  |L16.54|
;;;603      	  OLED_WrDat(F6x8[c][i]);  
000036  eb090149          ADD      r1,r9,r9,LSL #1
00003a  4a09              LDR      r2,|L16.96|
00003c  eb020141          ADD      r1,r2,r1,LSL #1
000040  5d88              LDRB     r0,[r1,r6]
000042  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
000046  1c70              ADDS     r0,r6,#1              ;602
000048  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0                 ;602
                  |L16.74|
00004a  2e06              CMP      r6,#6                 ;602
00004c  dbf3              BLT      |L16.54|
;;;604      	x+=6;
00004e  1da0              ADDS     r0,r4,#6
000050  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
;;;605      	j++;
000052  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1
000054  b2c7              UXTB     r7,r0
                  |L16.86|
000056  5de8              LDRB     r0,[r5,r7]            ;598
000058  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;598
00005a  d1df              BNE      |L16.28|
;;;606      }
;;;607    }
00005c  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
;;;608    //==============================================================
                          ENDP

                  |L16.96|
                          DCD      F6x8

                          AREA ||i.OLED_P8x16Num_8bit||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_P8x16Num_8bit PROC
;;;847    
;;;848      void OLED_P8x16Num_8bit(unsigned char x,unsigned char y,unsigned char Number)
000000  b5f8              PUSH     {r3-r7,lr}
;;;849    {
000002  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000004  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000006  4614              MOV      r4,r2
;;;850    	unsigned char ch[3]={0};
000008  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
00000a  9000              STR      r0,[sp,#0]
;;;851    	int n;
;;;852    	for(n=2;n>=0;n--)
00000c  2502              MOVS     r5,#2
00000e  e00d              B        |L17.44|
                  |L17.16|
;;;853    	{
;;;854    		ch[n]=Number%10+'0';
000010  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000012  fb94f1f0          SDIV     r1,r4,r0
000016  fb004011          MLS      r0,r0,r1,r4
00001a  3030              ADDS     r0,r0,#0x30
00001c  b2c0              UXTB     r0,r0
00001e  f80d0005          STRB     r0,[sp,r5]
;;;855    		Number=Number/10;
000022  200a              MOVS     r0,#0xa
000024  fb94f0f0          SDIV     r0,r4,r0
000028  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
00002a  1e6d              SUBS     r5,r5,#1              ;852
                  |L17.44|
00002c  2d00              CMP      r5,#0                 ;852
00002e  daef              BGE      |L17.16|
;;;856    	}
;;;857    	OLED_P8x16Str(x,y,ch);
000030  466a              MOV      r2,sp
000032  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000034  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000036  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_P8x16Str
;;;858    
;;;859    }
00003a  bdf8              POP      {r3-r7,pc}
;;;860      void OLED_P6x8Num_8bit(unsigned char x,unsigned char y,unsigned char Number)
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_P8x16Str||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  OLED_P8x16Str PROC
;;;613    //==============================================================  
;;;614      void OLED_P8x16Str(u8 x,u8 y,u8 ch[])//大字符串
000000  e92d47f0          PUSH     {r4-r10,lr}
;;;615    {
000004  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000006  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000008  4690              MOV      r8,r2
;;;616      u8 c=0,i=0,j=0;
00000a  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
00000c  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00000e  46a1              MOV      r9,r4
;;;617            
;;;618      while (ch[j]!='\0')
000010  e031              B        |L18.118|
                  |L18.18|
;;;619      {    
;;;620        c =ch[j]-32;
000012  f8180009          LDRB     r0,[r8,r9]
000016  3820              SUBS     r0,r0,#0x20
000018  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0
;;;621        if(x>120){x=0;y++;}
00001a  2e78              CMP      r6,#0x78
00001c  dd02              BLE      |L18.36|
00001e  2600              MOVS     r6,#0
000020  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1
000022  b2c7              UXTB     r7,r0
                  |L18.36|
;;;622        OLED_Set_Pos(x,y);    
000024  4639              MOV      r1,r7
000026  4630              MOV      r0,r6
000028  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;623      	for(i=0;i<8;i++)     
00002c  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
00002e  e007              B        |L18.64|
                  |L18.48|
;;;624      	  OLED_WrDat(F8X16[c*16+i]);
000030  eb041105          ADD      r1,r4,r5,LSL #4
000034  4a13              LDR      r2,|L18.132|
000036  5c50              LDRB     r0,[r2,r1]
000038  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
00003c  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;623
00003e  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0                 ;623
                  |L18.64|
000040  2c08              CMP      r4,#8                 ;623
000042  dbf5              BLT      |L18.48|
;;;625      	OLED_Set_Pos(x,y+1);    
000044  1c78              ADDS     r0,r7,#1
000046  b2c1              UXTB     r1,r0
000048  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00004a  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_Set_Pos
;;;626      	for(i=0;i<8;i++)     
00004e  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
000050  e008              B        |L18.100|
                  |L18.82|
;;;627      	  OLED_WrDat(F8X16[c*16+i+8]);  
000052  eb041105          ADD      r1,r4,r5,LSL #4
000056  3108              ADDS     r1,r1,#8
000058  4a0a              LDR      r2,|L18.132|
00005a  5c50              LDRB     r0,[r2,r1]
00005c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrDat
000060  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1              ;626
000062  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0                 ;626
                  |L18.100|
000064  2c08              CMP      r4,#8                 ;626
000066  dbf4              BLT      |L18.82|
;;;628      	x+=8;
000068  f1060008          ADD      r0,r6,#8
00006c  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;629      	j++;
00006e  f1090001          ADD      r0,r9,#1
000072  f00009ff          AND      r9,r0,#0xff
                  |L18.118|
000076  f8180009          LDRB     r0,[r8,r9]            ;618
00007a  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;618
00007c  d1c9              BNE      |L18.18|
;;;630      }
;;;631    }
00007e  e8bd87f0          POP      {r4-r10,pc}
;;;632    //输出汉字字符串
                          ENDP

000082  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L18.132|
                          DCD      F8X16

                          AREA ||i.OLED_Print||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_Print PROC
;;;689    //输出汉字和字符混合字符串
;;;690      void OLED_Print(unsigned char x, unsigned char y, unsigned char ch[])
000000  b5f8              PUSH     {r3-r7,lr}
;;;691    {
000002  4606              MOV      r6,r0
000004  460f              MOV      r7,r1
000006  4615              MOV      r5,r2
;;;692    	unsigned char ch2[3];
;;;693    	unsigned char ii=0;        
000008  2400              MOVS     r4,#0
;;;694    	while(ch[ii] != '\0')
00000a  e027              B        |L19.92|
                  |L19.12|
;;;695    	{
;;;696    		if(ch[ii] > 127)
00000c  5d28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r4]
00000e  287f              CMP      r0,#0x7f
000010  dd14              BLE      |L19.60|
;;;697    		{
;;;698    			ch2[0] = ch[ii];
000012  5d28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r4]
000014  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;699    	 		ch2[1] = ch[ii + 1];
000018  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00001a  5c28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r0]
00001c  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;700    			ch2[2] = '\0';			//汉字为两个字节
000020  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000022  f88d0002          STRB     r0,[sp,#2]
;;;701    			OLED_P14x16Str(x , y, ch2);	//显示汉字
000026  466a              MOV      r2,sp
000028  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00002a  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00002c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_P14x16Str
;;;702    			x += 14;
000030  f106000e          ADD      r0,r6,#0xe
000034  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;703    			ii += 2;
000036  1ca0              ADDS     r0,r4,#2
000038  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
00003a  e00f              B        |L19.92|
                  |L19.60|
;;;704    		}
;;;705    		else
;;;706    		{
;;;707    			ch2[0] = ch[ii];	
00003c  5d28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r4]
00003e  f88d0000          STRB     r0,[sp,#0]
;;;708    			ch2[1] = '\0';			//字母占一个字节
000042  2000              MOVS     r0,#0
000044  f88d0001          STRB     r0,[sp,#1]
;;;709    			OLED_P8x16Str(x , y , ch2);	//显示字母
000048  466a              MOV      r2,sp
00004a  4639              MOV      r1,r7
00004c  4630              MOV      r0,r6
00004e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_P8x16Str
;;;710    			x += 8;
000052  f1060008          ADD      r0,r6,#8
000056  b2c6              UXTB     r6,r0
;;;711    			ii+= 1;
000058  1c60              ADDS     r0,r4,#1
00005a  b2c4              UXTB     r4,r0
                  |L19.92|
00005c  5d28              LDRB     r0,[r5,r4]            ;694
00005e  2800              CMP      r0,#0                 ;694
000060  d1d4              BNE      |L19.12|
;;;712    		}
;;;713    	}
;;;714    } 
000062  bdf8              POP      {r3-r7,pc}
;;;715    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_Set_Pos||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  OLED_Set_Pos PROC
;;;403    }
;;;404    void OLED_Set_Pos(unsigned char x, unsigned char y)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;405    { 
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  460d              MOV      r5,r1
;;;406      OLED_WrCmd(0xb0+y);
000006  f10501b0          ADD      r1,r5,#0xb0
00000a  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;407      OLED_WrCmd(((x&0xf0)>>4)|0x10);
000010  2110              MOVS     r1,#0x10
000012  ea411014          ORR      r0,r1,r4,LSR #4
000016  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;408      OLED_WrCmd(x&0x0f);//|0x01);
00001a  f004000f          AND      r0,r4,#0xf
00001e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;409    } 
000022  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;410    void OLED_Fill(unsigned char bmp_data) //写数据比如写0x00为清屏 0xff为满频
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.OLED_WR_Byte||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  OLED_WR_Byte PROC
;;;276    *******************************************************************************/
;;;277    void OLED_WR_Byte(uint8_t dat,uint8_t cmd)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;278    {	
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
000004  460e              MOV      r6,r1
;;;279        uint8_t i;			  
;;;280        if(cmd)   OLED_RS_Set();
000006  b126              CBZ      r6,|L21.18|
000008  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
00000a  4814              LDR      r0,|L21.92|
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
000010  e003              B        |L21.26|
                  |L21.18|
;;;281        else      OLED_RS_Clr();		  
000012  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000014  4811              LDR      r0,|L21.92|
000016  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
                  |L21.26|
;;;282        for(i=0;i<8;i++)
00001a  2500              MOVS     r5,#0
00001c  e017              B        |L21.78|
                  |L21.30|
;;;283        {			  
;;;284    	    OLED_SCLK_Clr();
00001e  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000020  480e              LDR      r0,|L21.92|
000022  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
;;;285    	    if(dat&0x80)   OLED_SDIN_Set();
000026  f0040080          AND      r0,r4,#0x80
00002a  b120              CBZ      r0,|L21.54|
00002c  2104              MOVS     r1,#4
00002e  480b              LDR      r0,|L21.92|
000030  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
000034  e003              B        |L21.62|
                  |L21.54|
;;;286    	    else           OLED_SDIN_Clr();
000036  2104              MOVS     r1,#4
000038  4808              LDR      r0,|L21.92|
00003a  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
                  |L21.62|
;;;287    	    OLED_SCLK_Set();
00003e  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000040  4806              LDR      r0,|L21.92|
000042  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
;;;288    	    dat<<=1;   
000046  0660              LSLS     r0,r4,#25
000048  0e04              LSRS     r4,r0,#24
00004a  1c68              ADDS     r0,r5,#1              ;282
00004c  b2c5              UXTB     r5,r0                 ;282
                  |L21.78|
00004e  2d08              CMP      r5,#8                 ;282
000050  dbe5              BLT      |L21.30|
;;;289        }				 		 
;;;290        OLED_RS_Set();   	  
000052  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000054  4801              LDR      r0,|L21.92|
000056  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
;;;291    } 
00005a  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;292    
                          ENDP

                  |L21.92|
                          DCD      0x40011000

                          AREA ||i.OLED_WrCmd||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  OLED_WrCmd PROC
;;;379    }
;;;380    void OLED_WrCmd(unsigned char cmd)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;381    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;382    	unsigned char i=8;
000004  2508              MOVS     r5,#8
;;;383    	
;;;384       OLED_DC_OL;
000006  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000008  4812              LDR      r0,|L22.84|
00000a  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
;;;385       OLED_D0_OL;
00000e  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000010  4810              LDR      r0,|L22.84|
000012  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
;;;386    
;;;387       __NOP();
000016  bf00              NOP      
;;;388        
;;;389       while(i--)
000018  e016              B        |L22.72|
                  |L22.26|
;;;390       {
;;;391        if(cmd&0x80)
00001a  f0040080          AND      r0,r4,#0x80
00001e  b120              CBZ      r0,|L22.42|
;;;392    	  {OLED_D1_OH;}
000020  2104              MOVS     r1,#4
000022  480c              LDR      r0,|L22.84|
000024  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
000028  e003              B        |L22.50|
                  |L22.42|
;;;393        else
;;;394    	  {OLED_D1_OL;}
00002a  2104              MOVS     r1,#4
00002c  4809              LDR      r0,|L22.84|
00002e  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
                  |L22.50|
;;;395    
;;;396        OLED_D0_OH;
000032  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000034  4807              LDR      r0,|L22.84|
000036  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
;;;397        __NOP();
00003a  bf00              NOP      
;;;398                
;;;399        OLED_D0_OL;   
00003c  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
00003e  4805              LDR      r0,|L22.84|
000040  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
;;;400        cmd<<=1;;   
000044  0660              LSLS     r0,r4,#25
000046  0e04              LSRS     r4,r0,#24
                  |L22.72|
000048  1e28              SUBS     r0,r5,#0              ;389
00004a  f1a50101          SUB      r1,r5,#1              ;389
00004e  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1                 ;389
000050  d1e3              BNE      |L22.26|
;;;401      } 	
;;;402    	//LCD_CS=1;
;;;403    }
000052  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;404    void OLED_Set_Pos(unsigned char x, unsigned char y)
                          ENDP

                  |L22.84|
                          DCD      0x40011000

                          AREA ||i.OLED_WrDat||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=2

                  OLED_WrDat PROC
;;;357    
;;;358    void OLED_WrDat(unsigned char data)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;359    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;360    	unsigned char i=8;
000004  2508              MOVS     r5,#8
;;;361    
;;;362        OLED_DC_OH;
000006  2101              MOVS     r1,#1
000008  4813              LDR      r0,|L23.88|
00000a  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
;;;363    	  __NOP();
00000e  bf00              NOP      
;;;364        OLED_D0_OL;
000010  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000012  4811              LDR      r0,|L23.88|
000014  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
;;;365        __NOP();
000018  bf00              NOP      
;;;366      while(i--)
00001a  e016              B        |L23.74|
                  |L23.28|
;;;367      {
;;;368        if(data&0x80)
00001c  f0040080          AND      r0,r4,#0x80
000020  b120              CBZ      r0,|L23.44|
;;;369    	  {OLED_D1_OH;}
000022  2104              MOVS     r1,#4
000024  480c              LDR      r0,|L23.88|
000026  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
00002a  e003              B        |L23.52|
                  |L23.44|
;;;370        else
;;;371    	  {OLED_D1_OL;}
00002c  2104              MOVS     r1,#4
00002e  480a              LDR      r0,|L23.88|
000030  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
                  |L23.52|
;;;372    	  OLED_D0_OH;
000034  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000036  4808              LDR      r0,|L23.88|
000038  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_SetBits
;;;373        
;;;374        __NOP();
00003c  bf00              NOP      
;;;375                
;;;376        OLED_D0_OL;    
00003e  2108              MOVS     r1,#8
000040  4805              LDR      r0,|L23.88|
000042  f7fffffe          BL       GPIO_ResetBits
;;;377        data<<=1;    
000046  0660              LSLS     r0,r4,#25
000048  0e04              LSRS     r4,r0,#24
                  |L23.74|
00004a  1e28              SUBS     r0,r5,#0              ;366
00004c  f1a50101          SUB      r1,r5,#1              ;366
000050  b2cd              UXTB     r5,r1                 ;366
000052  d1e3              BNE      |L23.28|
;;;378      }
;;;379    }
000054  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;380    void OLED_WrCmd(unsigned char cmd)
                          ENDP

000056  0000              DCW      0x0000
                  |L23.88|
                          DCD      0x40011000

                          AREA ||i.SetAddressingMode||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  SetAddressingMode PROC
;;;448    
;;;449    void SetAddressingMode(unsigned char d)	
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;450    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;451    	OLED_WrCmd(0x20);			// Set Memory Addressing Mode
000004  2020              MOVS     r0,#0x20
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;452    	OLED_WrCmd(d);			//   Default => 0x02
00000a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;453    						//     0x00 => Horizontal Addressing Mode
;;;454    						//     0x01 => Vertical Addressing Mode
;;;455    						//     0x02 => Page Addressing Mode
;;;456    }
000010  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;457    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.SetColumnAddress||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  SetColumnAddress PROC
;;;457    
;;;458    void SetColumnAddress(unsigned char a, unsigned char b)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;459    {
000002  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000004  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;460    	OLED_WrCmd(0x21);			// Set Column Address
000006  2021              MOVS     r0,#0x21
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;461    	OLED_WrCmd(a);			//   Default => 0x00 (Column Start Address)
00000c  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;462    	OLED_WrCmd(b);			//   Default => 0x7F (Column End Address)
000012  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000014  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;463    }
000018  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;464    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.SetContrastControl||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  SetContrastControl PROC
;;;477    
;;;478      void SetContrastControl(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;479    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;480    	OLED_WrCmd(0x81);			// Set Contrast Control
000004  2081              MOVS     r0,#0x81
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;481    	OLED_WrCmd(d);			//   Default => 0x7F
00000a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;482    }
000010  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;483    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.SetPageAddress||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  SetPageAddress PROC
;;;464    
;;;465    void SetPageAddress(unsigned char a, unsigned char b)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;466    {
000002  4605              MOV      r5,r0
000004  460c              MOV      r4,r1
;;;467    	OLED_WrCmd(0x22);			// Set Page Address
000006  2022              MOVS     r0,#0x22
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;468    	OLED_WrCmd(a);			//   Default => 0x00 (Page Start Address)
00000c  4628              MOV      r0,r5
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;469    	OLED_WrCmd(b);			//   Default => 0x07 (Page End Address)
000012  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000014  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;470    }
000018  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;471    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.SetStartColumn||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  SetStartColumn PROC
;;;440    
;;;441    void SetStartColumn(unsigned char d)
000000  b570              PUSH     {r4-r6,lr}
;;;442    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;443    	OLED_WrCmd(0x00+d%16);		// Set Lower Column Start Address for Page Addressing Mode
000004  4625              MOV      r5,r4
000006  17e1              ASRS     r1,r4,#31
000008  eb047111          ADD      r1,r4,r1,LSR #28
00000c  1109              ASRS     r1,r1,#4
00000e  eba41101          SUB      r1,r4,r1,LSL #4
000012  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000014  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;444    						//   Default => 0x00
;;;445    	OLED_WrCmd(0x10+d/16);		// Set Higher Column Start Address for Page Addressing Mode
000018  4625              MOV      r5,r4
00001a  17e1              ASRS     r1,r4,#31
00001c  eb047111          ADD      r1,r4,r1,LSR #28
000020  1109              ASRS     r1,r1,#4
000022  3110              ADDS     r1,r1,#0x10
000024  b2c8              UXTB     r0,r1
000026  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;446    						//   Default => 0x10
;;;447    }
00002a  bd70              POP      {r4-r6,pc}
;;;448    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.SetStartLine||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  SetStartLine PROC
;;;471    
;;;472      void SetStartLine(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;473    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;474    	OLED_WrCmd(0x40|d);			// Set Display Start Line
000004  f0440040          ORR      r0,r4,#0x40
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;475    						//   Default => 0x40 (0x00)
;;;476    }
00000c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;477    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.SetStartPage||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  SetStartPage PROC
;;;529    
;;;530      void SetStartPage(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;531    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;532    	OLED_WrCmd(0xB0|d);			// Set Page Start Address for Page Addressing Mode
000004  f04400b0          ORR      r0,r4,#0xb0
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;533    						//   Default => 0xB0 (0x00)
;;;534    }
00000c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;535    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Charge_Pump||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Charge_Pump PROC
;;;483    
;;;484      void Set_Charge_Pump(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;485    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;486    	OLED_WrCmd(0x8D);			// Set Charge Pump
000004  208d              MOVS     r0,#0x8d
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;487    	OLED_WrCmd(0x10|d);			//   Default => 0x10
00000a  f0440010          ORR      r0,r4,#0x10
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;488    						//     0x10 (0x00) => Disable Charge Pump
;;;489    						//     0x14 (0x04) => Enable Charge Pump
;;;490    }
000012  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;491    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Common_Config||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Common_Config PROC
;;;565    
;;;566      void Set_Common_Config(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;567    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;568    	OLED_WrCmd(0xDA);			// Set COM Pins Hardware Configuration
000004  20da              MOVS     r0,#0xda
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;569    	OLED_WrCmd(0x02|d);			//   Default => 0x12 (0x10)
00000a  f0440002          ORR      r0,r4,#2
00000e  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;570    						//     Alternative COM Pin Configuration
;;;571    						//     Disable COM Left/Right Re-Map
;;;572    }
000012  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;573    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Common_Remap||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Common_Remap PROC
;;;535    
;;;536      void Set_Common_Remap(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;537    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;538    	OLED_WrCmd(0xC0|d);			// Set COM Output Scan Direction
000004  f04400c0          ORR      r0,r4,#0xc0
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;539    						//   Default => 0xC0
;;;540    						//     0xC0 (0x00) => Scan from COM0 to 63
;;;541    						//     0xC8 (0x08) => Scan from COM63 to 0
;;;542    }
00000c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;543    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Display_Clock||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Display_Clock PROC
;;;549    
;;;550      void Set_Display_Clock(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;551    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;552    	OLED_WrCmd(0xD5);			// Set Display Clock Divide Ratio / Oscillator Frequency
000004  20d5              MOVS     r0,#0xd5
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;553    	OLED_WrCmd(d);			//   Default => 0x80
00000a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;554    						//     D[3:0] => Display Clock Divider
;;;555    						//     D[7:4] => Oscillator Frequency
;;;556    }
000010  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;557    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Display_Offset||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Display_Offset PROC
;;;543    
;;;544      void Set_Display_Offset(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;545    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;546    	OLED_WrCmd(0xD3);			// Set Display Offset
000004  20d3              MOVS     r0,#0xd3
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;547    	OLED_WrCmd(d);			//   Default => 0x00
00000a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;548    }
000010  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;549    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Display_On_Off||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Display_On_Off PROC
;;;521    
;;;522      void Set_Display_On_Off(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;523    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;524    	OLED_WrCmd(0xAE|d);			// Set Display On/Off
000004  f04400ae          ORR      r0,r4,#0xae
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;525    						//   Default => 0xAE
;;;526    						//     0xAE (0x00) => Display Off
;;;527    						//     0xAF (0x01) => Display On
;;;528    }
00000c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;529    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Entire_Display||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Entire_Display PROC
;;;499    
;;;500      void Set_Entire_Display(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;501    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;502    	OLED_WrCmd(0xA4|d);			// Set Entire Display On / Off
000004  f04400a4          ORR      r0,r4,#0xa4
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;503    						//   Default => 0xA4
;;;504    						//     0xA4 (0x00) => Normal Display
;;;505    						//     0xA5 (0x01) => Entire Display On
;;;506    }
00000c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;507    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Inverse_Display||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Inverse_Display PROC
;;;507    
;;;508      void Set_Inverse_Display(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;509    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;510    	OLED_WrCmd(0xA6|d);			// Set Inverse Display On/Off
000004  f04400a6          ORR      r0,r4,#0xa6
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;511    						//   Default => 0xA6
;;;512    						//     0xA6 (0x00) => Normal Display
;;;513    						//     0xA7 (0x01) => Inverse Display On
;;;514    }
00000c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;515    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Multiplex_Ratio||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Multiplex_Ratio PROC
;;;515    
;;;516      void Set_Multiplex_Ratio(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;517    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;518    	OLED_WrCmd(0xA8);			// Set Multiplex Ratio
000004  20a8              MOVS     r0,#0xa8
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;519    	OLED_WrCmd(d);			//   Default => 0x3F (1/64 Duty)
00000a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;520    }
000010  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;521    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_NOP||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_NOP PROC
;;;579    
;;;580      void Set_NOP(void)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;581    {
;;;582    	OLED_WrCmd(0xE3);			// Command for No Operation
000002  20e3              MOVS     r0,#0xe3
000004  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;583    }
000008  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;584    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Precharge_Period||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Precharge_Period PROC
;;;557    
;;;558      void Set_Precharge_Period(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;559    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;560    	OLED_WrCmd(0xD9);			// Set Pre-Charge Period
000004  20d9              MOVS     r0,#0xd9
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;561    	OLED_WrCmd(d);			//   Default => 0x22 (2 Display Clocks [Phase 2] / 2 Display Clocks [Phase 1])
00000a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;562    						//     D[3:0] => Phase 1 Period in 1~15 Display Clocks
;;;563    						//     D[7:4] => Phase 2 Period in 1~15 Display Clocks
;;;564    }
000010  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;565    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_Segment_Remap||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_Segment_Remap PROC
;;;491    
;;;492      void Set_Segment_Remap(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;493    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;494    	OLED_WrCmd(0xA0|d);			// Set Segment Re-Map
000004  f04400a0          ORR      r0,r4,#0xa0
000008  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;495    						//   Default => 0xA0
;;;496    						//     0xA0 (0x00) => Column Address 0 Mapped to SEG0
;;;497    						//     0xA1 (0x01) => Column Address 0 Mapped to SEG127
;;;498    }
00000c  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;499    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.Set_VCOMH||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  Set_VCOMH PROC
;;;573    
;;;574      void Set_VCOMH(unsigned char d)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;575    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;576    	OLED_WrCmd(0xDB);			// Set VCOMH Deselect Level
000004  20db              MOVS     r0,#0xdb
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;577    	OLED_WrCmd(d);			//   Default => 0x20 (0.77*VCC)
00000a  4620              MOV      r0,r4
00000c  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;578    }
000010  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;579    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||i.adjust||, CODE, READONLY, ALIGN=1

                  adjust PROC
;;;435    
;;;436    void adjust(unsigned char a)
000000  b510              PUSH     {r4,lr}
;;;437    {
000002  4604              MOV      r4,r0
;;;438      OLED_WrCmd(a);	//指令数据0x0000~0x003f  
000004  4620              MOV      r0,r4
000006  f7fffffe          BL       OLED_WrCmd
;;;439    }
00000a  bd10              POP      {r4,pc}
;;;440    
                          ENDP


                          AREA ||.constdata||, DATA, READONLY, ALIGN=0

                  F6x8
000000  00000000          DCB      0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00
000004  00000000          DCB      0x00,0x00,0x00,0x00
000008  002f0000          DCB      0x00,0x2f,0x00,0x00
